responses.rationale: The segment reports on virus spread and test results, not primarily economic data or metrics.
Reports economic data ("largest producer and second-largest exporter") factually.
Reports economic data ("seventh biggest chicken-meat producing state") factually.
Reports economic data ("18 percent of U.S. poultry production is exported", "major user") factually.
Reports on economic conditions and factors ("supplies are down", "strong demand", "labor shortages") factually.
Reports numerical metrics ("down 14 percent", "down 23 percent") factually.
The segment reports on health risk frequency ("considered rare"), not primarily economic data or metrics.
The segment reports on historical virus origin and spread, not primarily economic data or metrics.
